dmca.title: DMCA - travelchinaguide
dmca.body:
ATTN: Google, Inc.

Goode Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA
Fax: (650) 963-3255

PROTM: Catherine He
Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 513Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.
Tel: (86-29) 8523 6688 Ext. 207
Fax: (86-29) 8539 7349
E-mail: edit@travelchinaguide.com

SUBJ: Copyright Infringement
PAGE:3
DATE: February 27, 2007
Sent via Fax & Email

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

The offender is www.ebeijing.gov.cn. They copied 8 pages of contents from our website. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages.

One more thing 1 would like to mention here is that our website www.travelchinaguide.com regularly updates our content to ensure the accuracy of the info. Thus we found that some of the contents they copied are now our old versions. Therefore we've provided the records on www.archive.org as proof.

2. Hereunder is the derailed information on the pages they have copied from our website:
(1)Search Query "great wall history"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/history/index.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20021015001604/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/history/index.htm  (October 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.cbeijing.gov.cn/About_Beijing/ArchaicCivilization/t185531.htm

(2)Search Query "Yonghe Lamasery"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/yonghe.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20030722231408/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/yonghe.htm  (July 2003 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Architectures/t631698.htm  (They copied our content of the first two paragraphs.)

(3)Search Query "Niujie Mosque"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/niujie.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20030625053559/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/niujie.htm  (June 2003 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Architectures/t631706.htm  (They copied our content of the first two paragraphs.)

(4)Search Query "Temple of Confucius"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/confucius.htm http://web.archive.org/web/20050729235547/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/confucius.htm	(July 2005 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Architectures/t631712.htm (They copied Our content of the first two paragraphs.)

(5)Search Query "www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Architectures/t631713.htm"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/guangjitemple.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/2005/124165118/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/guangji_temple.htm (November 2005 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Architectures/t631713.htm  (They copied our content of the first two paragraphs.)

(6)Search Query "Ming Tombs" (See more results from www.ebeijinggov.cn)
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/mingtomb.htm http://web.archive.org/web/20040407065106/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijingmingtomb.htm  (April 2004 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/featute/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Landscape/t631687.htm (They copied our content of the first two paragraphs.)

(7)Search Query "www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Landscape/t631688.htm"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.travelchinaguide.com/cityguides/beijing/summer.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20030302101657/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/intro/history/han/liubang.htm  (March 2003 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Landscape/t631688.htm

(8)Search Query "www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Aneient_Capital/Landscape/t631689.htm"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20030204013012/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/yuanruingyuan.httn (February 2003 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.ebeijing.gov.cn/feature/Beijing_Seoul_Photos_Exhibition/Ancient_Capital/Landscape/t631689.htm (they copied the content of the first paragraph of our old version.)

3.My contact information:
Catrerine He
edit@travelchinaguide.com
www.travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 513. Yu Yuan Mansion,
No_65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender www.ebeijing.gov.cn is:
Email: english@beijing.gov.cn
Fax: 86 10 6837 3088

5.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.I swear, tinder penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,
dmca.principal_name: Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
